title: Viet Nguyen
text:
About me
Hi, I am currently a junior student majoring in Data Science at University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH). My research lies in multimodal models  and generative models. I am also keen to work on models’ interpretability.


News

July 2024: I will join VIASM’s Summer School Series on Mathematical Statistics and Machine Learning
Apr 2024: I received the UEH Young Researcher 2024 Award.
Feb 2024: Our paper has been accepted at Journal of Uncertain Systems.
Mar 2023: Our paper has been accepted at ICICCT2023.
Feb 2023: I received the UEH Young Researcher 2023 Award.
Aug 2021: I was awarded the UEH Admission Scholarship.



Media Coverage

UEH Data Science student published 3 Scopus-indexed papers (in Vietnamese)
